sqlMap.select: select SC_PRODUCT_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PROD_CODE, PROD_NAME, PROD_DESC, STATE from SC_PRODUCT where SC_PRODUCT_ID = #scProductId:DECIMAL#
select SC_PRODUCT_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PROD_CODE, PROD_NAME, PROD_DESC, STATE from SC_PRODUCT where SC_ORG_ID = #value:DECIMAL# and STATE=1
sqlMap.insert: insert into SC_PRODUCT (SC_PRODUCT_ID, SC_ORG_ID, PROD_CODE, PROD_NAME, PROD_DESC, STATE) values (#scProductId:DECIMAL#, #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, #prodCode:VARCHAR#, #prodName:VARCHAR#, #prodDesc:VARCHAR#, #state:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update SC_PRODUCT set SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, PROD_CODE = #prodCode:VARCHAR#, PROD_NAME = #prodName:VARCHAR#, PROD_DESC = #prodDesc:VARCHAR#, STATE = #state:DECIMAL# where SC_PRODUCT_ID = #scProductId:DECIMAL#

update SC_PRODUCT
SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#
PROD_CODE = #prodCode:VARCHAR#
PROD_NAME = #prodName:VARCHAR#
PROD_DESC = #prodDesc:VARCHAR#
STATE = #state:DECIMAL#
where SC_PRODUCT_ID = #scProductId:DECIMAL#
